# Welcome {.unnumbered}

This website hosts the materials for the workshop "An Introduction to Network Analysis for GIS". The training workshop was designed by Dr Carmen Cabrera-Arnau, Prof Francisco Rowe, Dr Rafael Prieto Curiel, Andrew Renninger and Valentina Marin Maureira.

The website is free to use and is licensed under the Attribution-NonCommercial-NoDerivatives 4.0 International.
